2079210.name: It's Always Happy at Chubby's
2079210.description:
Step behind the counter, and into the apron at Chubby's — a fast food burger restaurant out in the middle of nowhere. During your night shifts, you'll be in charge of keeping the store clean and tidy, and serving the occasional customer at the drive thru.

CHUBBY'S IS HIRING!

EMPLOYEE FOR NIGHT SHIFT. COMPETITIVE PAY AND BENEFITS.

Looking for a job? Why not become part of the Chubby's family as night shift attendant at Chubby's — The Happiest Place in America™.

Duties

  • Cleaning up after the previous shift

  • Serving the Drive-Thru with a smile ;-)

  • Monitoring security cameras for unusual activity

  • Following the rules* outlined in our employee training videos (provided at the start of each night shift, free of charge)

Qualifications

  • A positive attitude

  • Comfortable to work alone, and stay calm under pressure

  • Must not suffer from fear of darkness

  • Must not be nosy or inquisitive in nature

Benefits

  • 50% off all Chubby's meals (excluding special offers)

  • Free apron and work clothes

  • Tips (if available) will be split between all employees and management

  • On the job training videos

  • 90 day probation

We can't wait to meet you! So don't be shy. Come by, say hi!

It's Always Happy at Chubby's!

---

*Rules ensure the safety of staff, and include, but are not limited to:

  • Don't serve customers who arrive on foot,

  • If the neon sign starts flickering, replace the fuse.

  • Make sure all doors are locked between 3am and 4am.

  • If a car drives up with flashing headlights, close the blinds immediatey.

  • If you hear footsteps, but nobody's there, turn off the lights and turn them back on after exactly 17 seconds.

Rules are subject to change every shift.
